name: Egg Nog
steps: Separate the yolks from the egg whites.
Mix all 12 yolks with the confectionary sugar, this works best with an egg beater.
Next place the mix into an empty gallon milk jug.
Add the milk and rum and shake well.
Let the first part sit for atleast 3 hours uncapped in the fridge.
Add the whipping cream and shake again.
This eggnog will last about 5-6 days.
